1389.question: Do experiment results show consistent significant improvement of new approach over traditional CNN and RNN models?

6-Table2-1.png: Yes, the experiment results show consistent significant improvement of the new approach over traditional CNN and RNN models, as indicated by the higher scores across all three datasets.</s>

Yes, the experiment results show consistent significant improvement of the new approach over traditional CNN and RNN models. For example, the 'Multi-channel CNN' has a MR score of 81.1, while the 'GRU (shallow fusion)' has a score of 90.9, indicating a substantial improvement.</s>
